attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July 2021 a Bank Holiday because it's coming home.
attributes.additional_details: 55 years of football wilderness and England finally have a shot at winning something. Make Monday a Bank Holiday so people can enjoy themselves without having to work hungover.
attributes.background: Make Monday 12th July 2021 a Bank Holiday because football is coming home. Let people have the day off to enjoy Sunday night

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
